summary: Completed comprehensive testing of EcoIntel RAG system after critical fixes. The embedding issue has been successfully resolved by switching to sentence-transformers, and error state display is now working. Core RAG functionality is working perfectly with 85.7% backend success rate and full frontend functionality.

minor_bugs.issue: DELETE request returns 520 error instead of 200
minor_bugs.impact: Document deletion fails but doesn't affect core RAG functionality

passed_tests: Stats endpoint showing proper document and query counts
Document upload with sentence-transformers embeddings (384 dimensions)
Document processing and text chunking working
FAISS vector storage and retrieval functioning
RAG query with GPT-4o generating relevant answers
Source attribution showing correct document references
Error state display in DocumentCard (Processing Failed status visible)
Homepage loads with professional EcoIntel branding
Navigation to main application interface working
Document Library showing upload area and document cards
Query Interface with input field and submit functionality
Complete end-to-end RAG workflow: upload → process → query → answer with sources
Professional UI design with proper status indicators

success_percentage.backend: 85.7% (6/7 endpoints working, only delete endpoint has minor issue)
success_percentage.frontend: 100% (All UI components and RAG functionality working perfectly)

action_item_for_main_agent: Minor fix needed: Document deletion endpoint returns 520 error instead of 200. This is a low priority issue as core RAG functionality is working perfectly. The critical embedding issue has been successfully resolved.
